name: Snowball Legends
description:
Snowball legends is a single player arena snowball shooter made for the Secret Santa Game Jam 2021. It was completed in 10 days with 1 programmer and 1 level designer.

Choose your Snowballer and take out your opponents with snowballs and powerups. Practice to become the best, take on the more challenging difficulties and compete to beat your best time.

Features:

  1. Arena style third person shooter gameplay
  2. 4 powerups
  3. 2 playable characters
  4. 8 enemies
  5. 3 difficulties

Controls:

Movement - W,A,S,D | Gamepad Left Joystick
Sprint - Shift | Gamepad LB
Aim/Camera - Mouse | Gamepad Right Stick
Throw - Left Mouse Button | Gamepad RT
*Hold Throw to increase accuracy and speed

*Multiplayer mode coming soon*
